fields_of_interest: Trade, Consumers, Customs, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, Public Health, Transport
eu_initiatives:
Activities around batteries in general: 
1) Battery Directive and other related pieces of legislation 
2) WEEE Directive and other related pieces of legislation 
3) ELV Directive  
4) waste framework diretive 
4) European waste catalogue 
Etc.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: EBRA is the association of the European battery recycling and sorting industry. We represent the interests of actors involved with sorting, treating and recycling consumer, industrial or automotive spent batteries (at the exception of lead-acid automotive batteries).
